title: Nearly Watch Face
summary: Android wear watch face that displays the time in an approximate way.
description: Nearly watch face displays current time in an approximative way, just like you would tell to someone else. How many times have you said: "it's quarter to five o'clock" or "few minutes to half past six"? This is what Nearly does.With a simple tap on the screen, you can always display current time and date.+++SUPPORTED LANGUAGES (WITH FULL TRANSLATION)+++- ENGLISH- FRENCH- ITALIAN- SPANISH- GERMAN- PORTUGUESE- MORE TO COME...
descriptionHTML:
Nearly watch face displays current time in an approximative way, just like you would tell to someone else. How many times have you said: "it's quarter to five o'clock" or "few minutes to half past six"? This is what Nearly does.
With a simple tap on the screen, you can always display current time and date.

+++SUPPORTED LANGUAGES (WITH FULL TRANSLATION)+++
- ENGLISH
- FRENCH
- ITALIAN
- SPANISH
- GERMAN
- PORTUGUESE
- MORE TO COME...
